mapper.insert: insert into meeting (meetingname, roomid, reservationistid, numberofparticipants, starttime, endtime, reservationtime, canceledtime, description, status) values (#{meetingname},#{roomid},#{reservationistid},#{numberofparticipants},#{starttime},#{endtime},#{reservationtime},#{canceledtime},#{description},#{status})
mapper.select:
SELECT meeting.meetingname, meetingroom.roomname, meeting.starttime, meeting.endtime, meeting.reservationtime, employee.employeename FROM meeting, meetingroom, employee where meeting.roomid = meetingroom.roomid and employee.employeeid = meeting.reservationistid
and meeting.meetingname like concat('%', #{meeting.meetingname}, '%')
and meetingroom.roomname like concat('%', #{meetingroom.roomname}, '%')
and employee.employeename like concat('%', #{employee.employeename}, '%')
limit #{page}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from meeting
inner JOIN meetingroom ON meeting.roomid = meetingroom.roomid and meetingroom.roomname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{meetingroom.roomname}, '%')
inner JOIN employee on employee.employeeid = meeting.reservationistid and employee.employeename LIKE CONCAT('%', #{employee.employeename}, '%')
meeting.meetingname like concat('%', #{meeting.meetingname}, '%')
